src:
全国私营银行协会举办2019年印尼银行业博览会

07 Nov 2019, 02:08



全国私营银行协会(Perbanas) 将再次举办2019年印尼银行业博览会（IBEX）题为巩固提升。政府面对当前的全球变化，全国私营银行协会提供有关该群岛金融服务主要思想的建议。图示 ：中亚银行董事总经理赵时建（左），印尼Maybank董事 总经理Taswin Zakaria 与金融服务管理局（OJK）银行监督委员会助理Boedi Armanto（右）于周三在雅加达2019年印尼银行业博览会活动时的情景。
text:
National Private Banking Association holds the 2019 Indonesian Banking Expo

07 Nov 2019, 02:08



The National Association of Private Banks (Perbanas) will once again host the 2019 Indonesian Banking Expo (IBEX) entitled Consolidation and Enhancement. In the face of current global changes, the National Private Banking Association provides advice on the main ideas of the island's financial services. Photo: Zhao Shijian, Managing Director of Central Asia Bank (left), Taswin Zakaria, Managing Director of Maybank, Indonesia, and Boedi Armanto (right), Assistant Banking Supervision Committee of the Financial Services Authority (OJK), at the Indonesian Banking Expo 2030 in Jakarta on Wednesday Scene.
